name: Equilibrium (domcrouse)
description:
The name ‘Equilibrium’ was chosen to signify the players end goal, which is to bring balance to the planets ravaged by a vicious warlord and his gang. Removal of this corruption will allow these planets to prosper once again.

If you also have the time, please fill out our feedback form!

https://forms.gle/4s5M9ZrjPjpGFmAr5
